pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 28, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Saint-Hubert, Quebec

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Canadian Space Agency, and make an important announcement. A media availability will follow. Minister of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Navdeep Bains, Minister of Transport Marc Garneau, and Minister of Science and Sport Kirsty Duncan will be in attendance.

Conference Centre
Canadian Space Agency
6767, route de l’Aéroport

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for announcement and media availability
  • Pooled photo opportunity for tour
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a national school assembly on space with high school students, along with Minister of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Navdeep Bains, as well as Canadian astronauts Jeremy Hansen and Jennifer Sidey-Gibbons, moderated by Minister of Transport Marc Garneau.

Conference Centre
Canadian Space Agency
6767, route de l’Aéroport

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.
